title: Registry Entry Schema
description: Schema for registry entries that map artifact ids to module ownership and on-disk paths.

artifact_id.description: Stable identifier used by callers (doc_id, pattern_id, config_id, etc.).

artifact_kind.description: Artifact type such as spec_doc, pattern_doc, schema, unit_test, code_module.

module_kind.description: Module classification enum used for refactor planning and validation.

version.description: Semantic version for the artifact entry.

status.description: Lifecycle state for this registry row.

checksum.description: Optional checksum (sha256 or similar) for file verification.

last_updated.description: Timestamp of the last update to this entry.

module_notes.description: Optional notes on module scope or migration considerations.
